August 9, 2025

Eibsee experience

By Amin Zamani in wanderings, storytelling, diary, Munich

Today I went to Lake Eibsee, a beautiful lake in southern Germany, located nearly 1,000 meters above sea level. It sits at the base of Zugspitze, Germany’s highest peak. The lake has this lovely greenish-blue color that I really liked.

By Amin Zamani in funny things, storytelling, diary

Today I learned about Richard Webber — an animator and director who makes funny little clay creatures. For some reason, I really connect with his work. I’m amazed at how simple yet expressive his creations are. Here’s one such clay work (screenshot from his website https://waaber.com):

August 3, 2025

Last week's seminar on quantum stuff

By Amin Zamani in diary, essay like, quantum

Intro

Last week I attended a seminar on quantum science with Rydberg atoms and molecules. It was held in Bad Honnef which is a town in the west of Germany and next to the Rhine river. The venue was a castle with a beautiful interior design. One of the nice things was the piano in one of the rooms. Sometimes one of the seminar attendees would feel like playing it which created a nice feeling.
